zh-cn: 温斯顿·雷欧纳德·斯宾塞·邱吉尔

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物、演说家、军官、历史学家、作家与画家，曾于1940年至1945年及1951年至1955年两度担任英国首相。
description.en: British statesman, orator, officer, historian, writer and artist who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，曾任财政大臣，是温斯顿·丘吉尔的父亲。
description.en: British statesman who served as Chancellor of the Exchequer, and was the father of Winston Churchill.

description.zh-cn: 美国社交名媛，温斯顿·丘吉尔的母亲。
description.en: American socialite and the mother of Winston Churchill.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔的妻子。
description.en: The wife of Winston Churchill.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的著名公学。
description.en: A famous public school in London, United Kingdom.

nodes.id: 皇家军事学院 (山德赫斯特)

zh-cn: 皇家军事学院 (山德赫斯特)
桑赫斯特皇家军事学院

description.zh-cn: 英国陆军的军官训练学院。
description.en: The British Army's officer training academy.

description.zh-cn: 英国的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国历史上的一个主要政党。
description.en: A major political party in British history.

description.zh-cn: 英国自由党政治家，曾任英国首相。
description.en: British Liberal politician who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战期间，协约国为夺取达达尼尔海峡而发动的军事行动，最终以失败告终。
description.en: A military campaign during World War I launched by the Allies to seize the Dardanelles, which ultimately ended in failure.

description.zh-cn: 英国自由党政治家，第一次世界大战后期担任英国首相。
description.en: A British Liberal politician who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom during the latter part of World War I.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国元首，第二次世界大战的发动者。
description.en: Führer of Nazi Germany and initiator of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 指阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治下的德国。
description.en: Germany under the rule of Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治家，因对纳粹德国实行绥靖政策而闻名，是丘吉尔的前任首相。
description.en: British Conservative politician, known for his policy of appeasement toward Nazi Germany, and Churchill's predecessor as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战前，英法等国对纳粹德国的侵略行为采取的姑息、妥协政策。
description.en: A policy of concession and compromise adopted by Britain, France, and other countries towards the aggressive actions of Nazi Germany before World War II.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突，轴心国与同盟国之间的大规模战争。
description.en: A global military conflict involving the Axis and Allied powers.

en: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 英国的政府首脑。
description.en: The head of government of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国国王及末任印度皇帝，在第二次世界大战期间是英国的国家元首。
description.en: King of the United Kingdom and the last Emperor of India, he was the British head of state during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 英国女王，乔治六世之女。
description.en: Queen of the United Kingdom, daughter of George VI.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治家，在丘吉尔战时内阁担任副首相，并于1945年接替丘吉尔成为首相。
description.en: British Labour politician who served as Deputy Prime Minister in Churchill's war cabinet and succeeded him as Prime Minister in 1945.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治家，曾任丘吉尔的副首相，并于1955年接替其成为首相。
description.en: British Conservative politician who served as Churchill's Deputy Prime Minister and succeeded him as Prime Minister in 1955.

nodes.id: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统，二战期间同盟国的核心领导人之一。
description.en: The 32nd President of the United States and a central figure among the Allied leaders during World War II.

nodes.id: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

zh-cn: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人，二战期间同盟国“三巨头”之一。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet Union and one of the 'Big Three' Allied leaders during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 法国将军和政治家，二战期间领导自由法国运动。
description.en: French general and statesman who led the Free French Forces during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中与同盟国对立的军事联盟，主要成员为德国、意大利和日本。
description.en: A military coalition that fought against the Allies in World War II, primarily consisting of Germany, Italy, and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 1946年温斯顿·丘吉尔在美国发表的著名演说，常被视为冷战开始的标志。
description.en: A famous speech delivered by Winston Churchill in the United States in 1946, often considered the starting signal of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 二战后以美国为首的西方集团与以苏联为首的东方集团之间的政治、经济和军事对抗。
description.en: The political, economic, and military confrontation between the Western Bloc, led by the United States, and the Eastern Bloc, led by the Soviet Union, after World War II.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统，在罗斯福去世后接任。
description.en: The 33rd President of the United States, who succeeded Franklin D. Roosevelt upon his death.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚大陆北部的社会主义国家，二战期间是同盟国成员，战后成为冷战中的主要一方。
description.en: A socialist state in northern Eurasia, a member of the Allies during WWII and a major party in the subsequent Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔是伦道夫·邱吉尔勋爵的儿子。
description.en: Winston Churchill was the son of Lord Randolph Churchill.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔是珍妮·杰罗姆的儿子。
description.en: Winston Churchill was the son of Jennie Jerome.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔于1908年9月12日与克莱门汀·霍齐尔结婚。
description.en: Winston Churchill married Clementine Hozier on September 12, 1908.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔于1888年入读哈罗公学。
description.en: Winston Churchill attended Harrow School from 1888.

relationships.target: 皇家军事学院 (山德赫斯特)

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔于1893年考入桑赫斯特皇家军事学院。
description.en: Winston Churchill entered the Royal Military College, Sandhurst in 1893.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔在其政治生涯中曾两度加入保守党。
description.en: Churchill was a member of the Conservative Party during two periods of his political career.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔于1904年从保守党转投自由党，并于1924年重返保守党。
description.en: Churchill crossed the floor from the Conservatives to the Liberal Party in 1904, and returned to the Conservatives in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔批准了加里波利之战计划，但战役的失败导致他被免去第一海军大臣职务，政治生涯陷入低谷。
description.en: Churchill approved the Gallipoli campaign plan, but its failure led to his removal as First Lord of the Admiralty, causing a major setback in his political career.

description.zh-cn: 在加里波利之战失败后，时任首相阿斯奎斯免去了丘吉尔的第一海军大臣职务。
description.en: After the failure of the Gallipoli campaign, Prime Minister Asquith removed Churchill from his position as First Lord of the Admiralty.

description.zh-cn: 1917年，时任首相劳合·乔治任命丘吉尔为军需部长，使其重返政府核心。
description.en: In 1917, Prime Minister Lloyd George appointed Churchill as Minister of Munitions, bringing him back into the heart of government.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔在1930年代是绥靖政策的主要反对者，他持续警告纳粹德国的威胁。
description.en: Throughout the 1930s, Churchill was a leading opponent of the policy of appeasement, consistently warning against the threat of Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 自希特勒上台以来，丘吉尔一直视其为欧洲和平的主要威胁，并在二战期间领导英国对抗纳粹德国。
description.en: From the time Hitler came to power, Churchill viewed him as the primary threat to European peace and led Britain against Nazi Germany during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的爆发使丘吉尔重返内阁，并最终于1940年成为英国首相。
description.en: The outbreak of World War II led to Churchill's return to the cabinet and ultimately his appointment as Prime Minister in 1940.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔接替内维尔·张伯伦成为英国首相。
description.en: Churchill succeeded Neville Chamberlain as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔曾两度担任英国首相。
description.en: Winston Churchill served two terms as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔在乔治六世国王在位期间担任首相。
description.en: Churchill served as Prime Minister during the reign of King George VI.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔在伊丽莎白二世女王在位初期担任首相。
description.en: Churchill served as Prime Minister during the early reign of Queen Elizabeth II.

description.zh-cn: 作为英国战时首相，丘吉尔领导同盟国对抗轴心国。
description.en: As Britain's wartime Prime Minister, Churchill led the Allied effort against the Axis powers.

relationships.target: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔与美国总统罗斯福在二战期间建立了紧密的战时同盟关系。
description.en: Churchill and U.S. President Roosevelt forged a close wartime alliance during World War II.

relationships.target: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

description.zh-cn: 尽管丘吉尔是坚定的反共主义者，但在二战期间，他与苏联领导人斯大林结成同盟以对抗纳粹德国。
description.en: Despite being a staunch anti-communist, Churchill formed an alliance with Soviet leader Stalin during World War II to combat Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 在法国投降后，丘吉尔支持戴高乐将军领导的自由法国运动。
description.en: After the fall of France, Churchill supported General de Gaulle's Free French movement.

description.zh-cn: 在1945年的大选中，克莱门特·艾德礼领导的工党击败了丘吉尔的保守党，两人成为政治上的主要对手。
description.en: In the 1945 general election, Clement Attlee's Labour Party defeated Churchill's Conservatives, making them primary political rivals.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔于1946年发表的“铁幕演说”被广泛认为是冷战开始的标志性事件。
description.en: Churchill's 'Iron Curtain' speech in 1946 is widely regarded as a symbolic starting point of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔发表铁幕演说时，时任美国总统杜鲁门是台下听众之一。
description.en: When Churchill delivered his Iron Curtain speech, then-U.S. President Truman was in the audience.

description.zh-cn: 二战后，丘吉尔明确将苏联视为西方民主世界的主要威胁。
description.en: After World War II, Churchill clearly identified the Soviet Union as the main threat to the Western democratic world.

description.zh-cn: 安东尼·艾登在丘吉尔的战时及战后内阁中长期担任其副手，并最终接替他成为首相。
description.en: Anthony Eden served as Churchill's deputy for a long time in his wartime and post-war cabinets, eventually succeeding him as Prime Minister.
